          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Circuit currents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreisströme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courants de circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Correntes do circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Correnti del circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρεύματα κυκλωμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corrientes del circuito</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows resistors connected in series and parallel. This can be used as an exercise to compute for the current passing through each resistor using Kirchoff's laws.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">currents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Kirchoff's laws</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parallel connections</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Resistors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">series connections</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Widerstände, die in der
Serie und in der Ähnlichkeit angeschlossen werden. Dieses kann 
als Übung verwendet werden, um für das aktuelle Überschreiten durch
jeden Widerstand mit Gesetzen Kirchoffs zu rechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des résistances 
reliées en série et le parallèle. Ceci peut être employé 
comme exercice pour calculer pour le dépassement actuel par chaque 
résistance en utilisant les lois de Kirchoff.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os resistores conectados 
em série e a paralela. Isto pode ser usado como um exercício 
computar para a passagem atual através de cada resistor usando leis 
de Kirchoff.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i resistori collegati 
in serie ed il parallelo. Ciò può essere usata come 
esercitazione per computare per passare corrente tramite ogni 
resistore usando le leggi del Kirchoff.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αντιστάτες που συνδέονται
στη σειρά και τον παράλληλο. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί 
ως άσκηση που υπολογίζει για το ρεύμα που περνά μέσω κάθε 
αντιστάτη χρησιμοποιώντας τους νόμους Kirchoff.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los resistores 
conectados en serie y paralelo. Esto se puede utilizar como 
ejercicio para computar para pasar actual a través de cada resistor 
usando los leyes de Kirchoff.</string>
          </description>
